name: KeepRunning WM
description:
BE WARNED: Insanely addictive!
Are you ready for a thrilling ride?

How to play:
Use you finger control the ball to swing in the pipeline, cross the hole and avoid hitting the wall. Collect Coins and unlock skin of ball. Try it, you will love it. More fun feature is coming soon.

What is your best score?

Download now and experience Rush! Have Fun.
